alert.note: Alert for Appling; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pierce, northeastern Brantley, northwestern Ware, Wayne and southeastern Appling Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Doctortown to near Screven to near Blackshear. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Jesup, Blackshear, Patterson, Gardi, Screven, Odum, Offerman, Pebble Hill and Raybon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
